m w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sitmval.d | |- D = ( dist ` W ) |

| 3 |  | sitmval.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. U. ran measures ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elex | |- ( W e. V -> W e. _V ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( w = W -> ( w sitg m ) = ( W sitg m ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( w = W -> dom ( w sitg m ) = dom ( W sitg m ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( dist ` w ) = ( dist ` W ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ofeq | |- ( ( dist ` w ) = ( dist ` W ) -> oF ( dist ` w ) = oF ( dist ` W ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( w = W -> oF ( dist ` w ) = oF ( dist ` W ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveqd | |- ( w = W -> ( f oF ( dist ` w ) g ) = ( f oF ( dist ` W ) g ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( w = W -> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg m ) ` ( f oF ( dist ` w ) g ) ) = ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg m ) ` ( f oF ( dist ` W ) g ) ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 7, 12 | #P_mpt2eq123dv | |- ( w = W -> ( f e. dom ( w sitg m ) , g e. dom ( w sitg m ) |-> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg m ) ` ( f oF ( dist ` w ) g ) ) ) = ( f e. dom ( W sitg m ) , g e. dom ( W sitg m ) |-> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg m ) ` ( f oF ( dist ` W ) g ) ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( W sitg m ) = ( W sitg M ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( m = M -> dom ( W sitg m ) = dom ( W sitg M ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( m = M -> ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg m ) = ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ) |
| 17 | 1 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( dist ` W ) = D |
| 18 |  | #P_ofeq | |- ( ( dist ` W ) = D -> oF ( dist ` W ) = oF D ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_mp1i | |- ( m = M -> oF ( dist ` W ) = oF D ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_oveqd | |- ( m = M -> ( f oF ( dist ` W ) g ) = ( f oF D g ) ) |
| 21 | 16, 20 | #P_fveq12d | |- ( m = M -> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg m ) ` ( f oF ( dist ` W ) g ) ) = ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( f oF D g ) ) ) |
| 22 | 15, 15, 21 | #P_mpt2eq123dv | |- ( m = M -> ( f e. dom ( W sitg m ) , g e. dom ( W sitg m ) |-> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg m ) ` ( f oF ( dist ` W ) g ) ) ) = ( f e. dom ( W sitg M ) , g e. dom ( W sitg M ) |-> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( f oF D g ) ) ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_df-sitm | |- sitm = ( w e. _V , m e. U. ran measures |-> ( f e. dom ( w sitg m ) , g e. dom ( w sitg m ) |-> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg m ) ` ( f oF ( dist ` w ) g ) ) ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( W sitg M ) e. _V |
| 25 | 24 | #P_dmex | |- dom ( W sitg M ) e. _V |
| 26 | 25, 25 | #P_mpt2ex | |- ( f e. dom ( W sitg M ) , g e. dom ( W sitg M ) |-> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( f oF D g ) ) ) e. _V |
| 27 | 13, 22, 23, 26 | #P_ovmpt2 | |- ( ( W e. _V /\ M e. U. ran measures ) -> ( W sitm M ) = ( f e. dom ( W sitg M ) , g e. dom ( W sitg M ) |-> ( ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) sitg M ) ` ( f oF D g ) ) ) ) |
